author: Batjay23
title: This Tumbler is flatout amazing!
review:
I Love this set! I got it two days ago, built it this morning and LOVE it!

The Minifigures: Batman (Batman Begins suit), and Scarecrow. Two fantastic minifigures, the only problem I have with Batman is there are no printings on his arms or legs, makes him look a little weak in comparison to the actual suit. Scarecrow is perfect though!

Value for money: Worth it. No... wait... TOTALLY WORTH IT! At $39.99 for 422 pieces, it's a typical Lego set bargain. But for what the set is, it's great!

Playability: A little boxy but this is expected from a Lego vehicle. I like that it seats two. The mobility of the flaps is great. But the guns being right up by the tiers is a little downer for me.

Parts: Great usage of parts! A lot of diverse pieces that I don't have from other sets.

Building experience: The usage of the aforementioned parts are an absolute joy while building! I had a blast building, and a fun time watching the familiar shape from the iconic film series come to life in LEGO form.

Overall rating: A simple Joy! A truly remarkable addition to my collection. It is just simply better than the original 2008 Tumbler. The sleek, and more compact design is fantastic!
